casebody.data:
Steamtug Top Sergeant, Inc., as Owner of THE Tug TOP SERGEANT, Libelant-Appellee, v. THE Tug NEW YORK CENTRAL NO. 17 and The New York Central Railroad Company, Respondent-Claimant-Appellant. No. 416. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 20, 1935. Jacob Aronson, of New York City (Ken.neth O. Mott-Smith, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Purdy & Purdy, of New York City (Frank C. Mason, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
